testcase.name: Find what I'm looking for

failure.message: failed Find what I'm looking for

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Find what I'm looking for
Given I am on the "home_page" When I set "cucumber github" in "Search field" of "Home page" When I click "Search button" on "Home page" Then I should see "GitHub" text on the screen When I click "konnichiwa" on "Home page"
Message:
/var/lib/gems/1.8/gems/watir-webdriver-0.3.2/lib/watir-webdriver/elements/element.rb:248:in `assert_exists': unable to locate element, using {:xpath=>"konnn", :tag_name=>"button"} (Watir::Exception::UnknownObjectException) ./libs/props.rb:139:in `make' (eval):1:in `make' ./features/step_definitions/steps.rb:20:in `eval' ./libs/props.rb:139:in `make' ./features/step_definitions/steps.rb:20 ./libs/helpers.rb:15:in `wait' ./features/step_definitions/steps.rb:20:in `/I (.*) "(.*)" on "(.*)"/' features/search.feature:11:in `When I click "konnichiwa" on "Home page"'
